title: Memory Passage Test
description: Read the passage carefully. It will disappear after a few seconds, and then you'll be asked 5 questions about it.

passage.text: Yesterday, Sarah went to the market and bought apples, oranges, and bananas. She met her friend James there, and they decided to have lunch together at a small café nearby. After lunch, Sarah returned home and read a book while James went to play basketball with his friends.

questions.question: Where did Sarah and James have lunch?
What did Sarah do after lunch?
What did James do after lunch?
